RTCPeerConnectionAddstream_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The obsolete addstream event is sent to an when new media, in the form of a object, has been added to it.

blockquote.para: Warning: This event has been removed from the WebRTC specification. You should instead watch for the event, which is sent for each media track added to the RTCPeerConnection.

remarks.para: You can, similarly, watch for streams to be removed from the connection by monitoring the event.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
